1.0.name: wordpress/dynamicwp-fisheye-menu
1.0.description:
DynamicWP fisheye menu is a jQuery wordpress plugin, this plugin will build a Fisheye menu from a list of links. Like Mac OS user interface at the bottom of the screen, where there is a dockbar with icons on it, and when you mouse over the icons they grow in size, giving the “fisheye” effect. This plugin using a script to displayed, so you can put it anywhere you like.

Features

  • Easy to use
  • Navigation menus with fisheye effect
  • Can appear anywhere

Demo

Please check Fisheye Menu demo page.

Credit

This plugin based jQuery Fisheye Menu, author Stefan Petre
